text: Modesto De Silvestro (born 21 June 1950) is an Italian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1976 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Modesto De Silvestro
